Title: Permits midwives and physician assistants to certify the cause of death on a fetal death certificate
Summary: Permits midwives and physician assistants to certify the cause of death on a fetal death certificate if they are in attendance at or after a fetal death.
LawCode: Amd ยง4161, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to certification of fetal death certificates by a midwife or physician assistant
